com.droidcare.control

Class ImageManager

  • Object
    • ImageManager

  • public class ImageManager
extends Object
    Encodes an image Bitmap object into a Base64 encoded String and decodes a Base64 encoded String into an image Bitmap object.
    Author:
    Edwin Candinegara

      • convertDpToPixel

        public static float convertDpToPixel(float dp,
                     Context context)
        This method converts dp unit to equivalent pixels, depending on device density. Credits to: - Stack Overflow answer
        Parameters:
        dp - A value in dp (density independent pixels) unit which we need to convert into pixels
        context - Context to get resources and device specific display metrics
        Returns:
        A float value to represent px equivalent to dp depending on device density

      • encodeImageBase64

        public String encodeImageBase64(Bitmap image)
        Encodes an image Bitmap into a Base64 encoded String and returns the encoded String.
        Parameters:
        image - Bitmap object of the image.
        Returns:
        a Base64 encoded String.

      • decodeImageBase64

        public Bitmap decodeImageBase64(String encodedImage)
        Decodes a Base64 encoded String into an image Bitmap object and returns the image Bitmap object.
        Parameters:
        encodedImage - a Base64 encoded String.
        Returns:
        an image Bitmap object.

      • rescaleImage

        public Bitmap rescaleImage(Bitmap image)
        Rescales the original image bitmap
        Parameters:
        image - the image to be rescaled
        Returns:
        the rescaled image
